attributes.action: Make Buying Land to Live Off-grid and Eco Friendly legal.
attributes.background: In a world where global warming, house prices and high costs of living are a serious issue.  Living the good life, promoting clean renewable methods of living should be welcomed not criticised. Certain rules need to be met but people shouldn't be evicted for living Eco freindly on their own land.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
